group_1.textRight: Why here?

group_1.textLeft: It's the closest place...and the cheapest...

group_1.textRight: Ehhh... I don't really like the food here...

group_1.textLeft: What? Really? But...
It may not taste GREAT, but it certainly@doesn't taste terrible...

group_1.textRight: It's so oily... It's always got such a heavy@flavor.
It never sits well[chara:101101:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into] in my stomach...

group_1.textLeft: I think that's because a certain someone @is always eating bland mush...
You love all that flavorless junk old people@eat, don't you?

group_1.textRight: D-don't be mean!
That stuff is ORGANIC, okay!

group_1.textLeft: Anyway, food here comes out fast, and that's@all I care about right now. Quit whining...

group_1.textRight: Oh, by the way.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah?

group_1.textRight: Just so ya know, I don't have a single yen@on me.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100901:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What?! You came all the way with us, and@you're just saying that NOW?!

group_1.textRight: I never said I wanted to eat food, did I?

group_1.textLeft: No... You didn't...

group_1.textRight: I'm just here to get information.
So I don't need you guys to pay for me or@anythin'.
I just wanna get some leads on the people@I'm lookin' for...

group_1.textLeft: Aughhh! Okay, fine!
[chara:100901:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]Whatever! Let's just go in!
You did put up with me... Lemme make it up@to you!
It's my treat!

group_1.textRight: [chara:101101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What?!

group_1.textLeft: *Huff* *Puff*

group_1.textRight: Well, if you insist, it's not like I'm gonna@turn you down.
Rena! Is it really okay...for you to@treat us?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, yeah, it's fine. I'll just use the@friendship discount.
More importantly...
Standing out here talking is more risky than@just paying for you.

group_1.textRight: You don't ever hold back, do you...

group_1.textLeft: Oh! Rena, welcome!

group_1.textRight: Nice to see you again.

group_1.textLeft: What's this? You brought friends today!

group_1.textRight: Hey there.
Ah! Hello!

group_1.textLeft: Sadly, Tsuruno isn't around today. She went@out with Yachiyo.

group_1.textRight: [chara:200601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...!
Eh, no worries. I'll take the vegetable fried@rice and gyoza meal.

group_1.textLeft: You got it!

group_1.textRight: You already knew what you wanted!

group_1.textLeft: (He said "Yachiyo"... That name...)

group_1.textCenter: I'm Yachiyo Nanami, a Magical Girl.
(I thought I might've picked someone who@was gonna be a dud, but...)
(Turns out I may have struck gold instead.)

group_1.textRight: Rena! You shouldn't eat so many pickled@vegetables!

group_1.textLeft: Homph...@*Munch* *Munch*
It'sh fine, [chara:100901:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100901:cheek_0][chara:100901:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:100901:lipSynch_1]dat's why dey puthem on the@table...

group_1.textCenter: (So this is how wild animals feed when left@to their instincts?)
